special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I, II – Return target permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a snow counter on it.
III – Tap up to one target creature. Put a stun counter on it for each snow permanent you control.
​
notes:
ARTed

remove the snow on this saga
